description: Compaction summary response — iterative update of existing summary

events.data:
{"type":"response.output_text.delta","delta":"## Goal
Implement a real-time metrics dashboard using Phoenix LiveView.

## Constraints & Preferences
- Use LiveView for real-time WebSocket updates
- Poll metrics every 5 seconds
- Add proper error handling for metric collection failures

"}

{"type":"response.output_text.delta","delta":"## Progress
### Done
- [x] Created DashboardLive module with mount/3 and handle_info/2
- [x] Added /dashboard route to router.ex
- [x] Implemented metrics polling
- [x] Created dashboard test file
- [x] Added chart visualization with Chartkick
- [x] Added error handling for failed metric collections

### In Progress
- [ ] Adding authentication guard to dashboard

"}

{"type":"response.output_text.delta","delta":"## Key Decisions
- **:timer.send_interval**: Simpler for fixed-interval polling
- **Chartkick over custom D3**: Faster to implement

## Next Steps
1. Add authentication guard to dashboard route
2. Deploy and monitor performance

## Critical Context
- MetricsCollector GenServer at lib/app/metrics_collector.ex
- Error handling wraps metric calls in try/rescue with fallback values"}

{"type":"response.output_text.done","text":"## Goal
Implement a real-time metrics dashboard using Phoenix LiveView.

## Constraints & Preferences
- Use LiveView for real-time WebSocket updates
- Poll metrics every 5 seconds
- Add proper error handling for metric collection failures

## Progress
### Done
- [x] Created DashboardLive module with mount/3 and handle_info/2
- [x] Added /dashboard route to router.ex
- [x] Implemented metrics polling
- [x] Created dashboard test file
- [x] Added chart visualization with Chartkick
- [x] Added error handling for failed metric collections

### In Progress
- [ ] Adding authentication guard to dashboard

## Key Decisions
- **:timer.send_interval**: Simpler for fixed-interval polling
- **Chartkick over custom D3**: Faster to implement

## Next Steps
1. Add authentication guard to dashboard route
2. Deploy and monitor performance

## Critical Context
- MetricsCollector GenServer at lib/app/metrics_collector.ex
- Error handling wraps metric calls in try/rescue with fallback values"}
